pages.text: In this mod there are 3 Form Component items(So Far). Each component is used in the Essence Infusion Station to craft a form of any type as long as it is of the same tier. You'll need one of these if you want to craft a form!

pages.title: Component: Type 1
pages.text: Can be used for Type1 Forms

pages.title: Component: Type 2
pages.text: Can be used for Type2 Forms

pages.title: Component: Type 2
pages.text: Can be used for Type3 Forms
